quotes.quote: Do not, on a rainy day, ask your child what he feels like doing, because I assure you that what he feels like doing, you won't feel like watching.
A rainy day is like a lovely gift -- you can sleep late and not feel guilty.
On a sunny clear day, you can improve your body; on a rainy fogy day, you can improve your mind!
A rainy day is an equalizer. You don't know what's going to happen. You just take what you can get.
I just love watching the rain falling off to the ground, pouring from the roof, kissing all the leafs and seems like the wind entice me to get wet.
Give thanks for the rain in your life which waters the flowers of your soul.
Rainy days should be spent at home with a cup of tea and a good book.
Some people are making such thorough preparation for rainy days that they aren't enjoying today's sunshine.
I always feel sorry for people who think more about a rainy day ahead than sunshine today.
On a rainy day many offer to water the chickens.
He who marries on a rainy day will be happy for the rest of his life.
God made rainy days so gardeners could get the housework done.
One can find so many pains when the rain is falling.
There's nothing like a little rain to bring people together.
Remember; not every rainy day holds within it the promise of any rainbow.
Into each life some rain must fall.
You pray for rain, you gotta deal with the mud too. That's a part of it.

Like the sky opens after a rainy day we must open to ourselves. Learn to love yourself for who you are and open so the world can see you shine.
A rainy day is the perfect time for a walk in the woods.
